alert.note: Alert for Stark (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 12:28PM EST until February 18 at 12:28PM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Cleveland OH has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Ohio... Chagrin River At Willoughby affecting Lake County. Grand River At Painesville affecting Lake County. Maumee River At Waterville affecting Wood and Lucas Counties. Nimishillen Creek Near North Industry affecting Stark County. For the Chagrin River...including Willoughby...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Grand River...including Painesville...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Maumee River...including Waterville...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Nimishillen Creek...including North Industry...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Nimishillen Creek Near North Industry. * WHEN...From this evening to early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Water backs up into a mobile home park on Cleveland Southwest Avenue in Canton Township. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:15 PM EST Thursday the stage was 7.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening to a crest of 11.0 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 11.1 feet on 07/19/2011. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening by 1030 PM EST.
